tool.name: winner
tool.command:
mkdir fast5files &&
#for $f in $fast5in ln -s '$f' 'fast5files/${f.name}' && #end for
poretools winner --type $type fast5files/ > '$winner'
tool.help:
@HELP_GENERAL@
**Command Documentation**
Report the longest read among a set of FAST5 files.
For more information about this command, see command_doc_ and command_doc2_
